DOC.brief_title: Effects Selected Vegetable Herb Mix ( SV ) Advanced Non-small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Carcinoma lung lead cause cancer relate death North America . Non-small Cell Lung Cancer ( NSCLC ) cause death 400,000 patient annually US Western Europe . The benefit conventional therapy , chemotherapy radiotherapy , unresectable stage IIIB IV NSCLC patient small ; generally accept median survival time late stage patient remain 4-6 month `` Supportive Care '' group 6-9 month chemotherapy treatment group ; one-year survival 20 % . Ideal Treatment NSCLC : The toxicity chemotherapy side-effects radiotherapy quality life patient major issue cancer treatment . It significant enough many patient choose forgo standard treatment . Furthermore , current chemotherapy advance NSCLC quite expensive , $ 50,000 $ 100,000 per year . Therefore , ideal treatment advance NSCLC patient meet follow criterion : 1 . Prolong patient survival . 2 . Minimal toxicity . 3 . Improvement patient 's quality life . 4 . Relatively inexpensive . A phytomix consist select vegetable herbs appear meet criterion . The phytomix consist 19 vegetable herb highly concentrated form . These vegetable herbs select base anti-cancer immune-enhancing activity . Each batch raw material go strict quality control ( QC ) scheme make sure product meet QC standard devoid deleterious contamination , heavy metal , pesticide , aflatoxin , microorganism . The manufacturing process tightly control ensure batch-to-batch consistency . The final product , 20 gram freeze-dried powder , seal pouch . In previous study , patient ingest phytomix daily 17-60 month show clinical sign adverse effect . The Objectives propose study evaluate benefit adverse reaction add SV daily diet cancer patient willing undergo chemotherapy ( Study 1 ) refuse chemotherapy ( Study 2 ) .
DOC.criteria: Pathological radiographic document stage IIIB/IV NSCLC ( squamous , adenocarcinoma , bronchioloalveolar , large cell , undifferentiated otherwise specify nonsmall cell carcinoma ) diagnose less two month prior randomization . Patients must ECOG performance status 01 life expectancy > 3 month . Patients must never diagnose malignancy current NSCLC , except nonmetastatic nonmelanoma skin cancer , cancer situ cervix . Patients must > 18 year age . Patients must demonstrate ability willingness eat solid food SV/placebo . Patients must demonstrate ability willingness give inform consent . Patients must demonstrate ability willingness follow study requirement . Laboratory criteria exclusion within 14 day prior randomization . Liver function : bilirubin > 1.5x upper limit normal ( ULN ) SGOT ( AST ) > 2.5x ULN . Renal function : Serum creatinine > 1.5x ULN Bone marrow function : white blood cell ( WBC ) < 4,000/µl ; platelet count < 100,000 mm3 ; neutrophil count < 1,500/mm3 . Hemoglobin < 9 gm/dl male ; < 8.5 gm/dl female . Unexplained temperature > 38.5° C 7 consecutive day chronic diarrhea define > 3 stools/day persist 15 consecutive day , within 30 day prior randomization . Prior chemotherapy within 5 year . Prior radiation area measurable active tumor . Significant cardiac disease ( i.e . uncontrolled high blood pressure , unstable angina , congestive heart failure , myocardial infarction within previous year ) serious cardiac arrhythmia require medication . Evidence clinically significant neuropathy ( > Grade 1 ) physical exam . Patients must pregnant breastfeeding . Female patient childbearing potential must negative pregnancy test perform within 72 hour prior randomization . Women childbearing potential must agree become pregnant participate study . Active acute infection , except Herpes virus ( cytomegalovirus [ CMV ] , Epstein Barr virus [ EBV ] , herpes zoster virus [ HZV ] , herpes simplex virus 1 [ HSV 1 ] ) . A serious underlying medical condition NSCLC life expectancy le 2 year . Psychiatric illness may affect patient 's compliance treatment . Current use illicit drug , glucocorticoid necessary concurrent radiotherapy , adrenal failure septic shock , immunesuppressing immunemodulating drug . Glucocorticoids antiemetic prophylaxis therapy use last resort . A known allergy one component SV , namely soy bean , mushroom , mung bean , red date , scallion , garlic , lentil bean , leek , hawthorn fruit , onion , ginseng , angelica root , Chinese licorice , dandelion root , Senegal root , ginger , olive , sesame seed parsley .
